title: ISic002984. I.Sicily inscription 002984
body:

2IULIO[---]

4SACERD[..---]
5CERERIS[---]
6MATERL[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text based upon photograph; Manganaro: TI[---]; stone shows traces of cross stroke to the vertical
line.3: Manganaro: Tettia L(uci)[---f(ilia)]
line.4: Manganaro: Sacerd[os publ(ica)(?)]
line.5: Manganaro: Cereris [Aug(ustae) (?)]
line.6: Manganaro: mater l(oco) [d(ato) d(ecreto) d(ecurionum)]; traces on stone not clearly compatible with L·

commentary
